conbody.p: This section contains release notes for Eucalyptus version 3.2.1.
conbody.note: There is an issue with the current Eucalyptus EMC SAN adapter in both 3.2.0 and 3.2.1. The EMC SAN adapter, when used in a cluster with two or more Node Controllers, has issues with EBS instances that have EBS volumes attached. These deployments are likely to incur data losses. You can test the EMC adapter with 3.2.x if there is only one NC in the cluster OR there are no EBS instances with attached EBS volumes. For more information, see the entry for EUCA-4872 in .
